title: Fragment, ca. 1810
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique:printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 109.5 (43in.). Weft: 56cm (22in.) Partial selvedge at right side only.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 51cm (20 in.).
description: Scene of Cupid with woman with wings on her head holding a lyre; scene of woman kneeling before a statue of Cupid, scene of Cupid tying the hands of a woman and scene of a woman with a dog on its hind legs. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, ca. 1810.Medium: cotton 
Technique:printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-54.
